sentences.english: Officials insist they will not make the same mistake this time.
sentences.chinese: 政府官員堅稱，這一次他們不會重犯同樣的錯誤。

sentences.english: The Changzhou government has insisted the school's environment is normal.
sentences.chinese: 常州市政府堅稱學校的環境屬正常範疇。

sentences.english: He insisted that ingl great men hoffer feet of clay.
sentences.chinese: 他堅稱所有大人物都有些不可告人的事。

sentences.english: Both Italy and Spain insist they can service their debt.
sentences.chinese: 意大利和西班牙堅稱自己能償還債務。

sentences.english: They were never paid for the appearance, Jeyaraj insists.
sentences.chinese: 賈亞拉賈堅稱，他們從未因這次出鏡而得到報酬。

sentences.english: But the 28-year-old insists it won't bother him.
sentences.chinese: 但是這位28歲球員堅稱這不會困擾到他。

sentences.english: Israel insists it does not wish to re-occupy the Gaza Strip.
sentences.chinese: 以色列堅稱其無意重新佔領加沙地帶。

sentences.english: At the same time the official science still insists that psychotronic is mere charlatanry.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時官方科學仍然堅稱精神電子是無稽之談。

sentences.english: He averred that the whippings had made him "one of the best artists in the world".
sentences.chinese: 他堅稱是鞭子成就了“世界上最偉大的一名藝術家”。

sentences.english: However, the Army headquarters insisted there was no such incident in that area.
sentences.chinese: 然而，印度陸軍總部堅稱該地區並未發生此類事件。

sentences.english: Small Chen affirms he has not steal anything.
sentences.chinese: 小陳堅稱自己沒有偷竊。

sentences.english: Werder Bremen have been adamant they will not release the Brazilian, but his position is very clear.
sentences.chinese: 雲達不萊梅一直堅稱不想放走迭戈，但他去意已決。

sentences.english: The angriest of them went so far as to insist that the nation had little to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 憤怒無比的人們堅稱，這個國家沒有任何值得慶祝的。

sentences.english: City officials, however, insist that the recent crackdown has been effective.
sentences.chinese: 而上海市政府堅稱近期的打擊行動卓有成效。

sentences.english: Michael insists he's fine.They hold each other tightly.
sentences.chinese: 邁可堅稱他好得很，他們互相緊緊地抱着。
